type: Tutorial Step - Need a Quick Reminder?

definition.text: At this point, I'm probably overflowing your hippocampus! But don't worry... you may go back to any previous step!

paragraphs.text: If you ever need a reminder about any of these topics...

Find a Tutorial Topic and replay it! You may find me on the bottom-left corner of the design space, expand me, browse through the hierarchy of topics and steps, and click Play on any of them. Topics are arranged in a clockwise direction, starting from the right-hand side of the main Tutorial node.
Need a Quick Reminder? Find the step under the Tutorials & Help topic below. Then click Stop, and restart by clicking Play on the said Tutorial Step!
